title: Game Progress Route
content:
vincibility. You’ll have the following options to reply with:

Ketheric’s days are numbered. I’ll make sure of it. You want to make use of my infection - I want to be cured of it. Seems like I’ll be doing most of the heavy lifting. I’m not doing this.

Choosing the second option will have her explain that you’ll probably find a means to cure yourself in the Moonrise Towers anyway. You can then ask her how to get there past the debilitating shadows. She’ll explain that Isobel, a Cleric of Selune,
